subject: [junit] running a single test method  out of 20 methods in my junittest  in eclipse  how to ?
msgSnippet: I have a Junit test class which has 20 test methods.If I want to test  a single test method  is there a way .I run junit tests from eclipse , so is there any
messageBody:
I have a Junit test class which has 20 test methods.If I want to test a
single test method is there a way .I run junit tests from eclipse , so is
there any way in eclipse i can ask junit runner to run just one test method
or few test methods and not all ?
--
